briefdescription.para: constructCompositeShapeConstraint Construct a constraint based on each sub shape of a CompositeShape

parameterdescription.para: CompositeShape of the volume in entity frame
offset to the constraint. N.B.: this is applied to the children of the composite shape separately. As a result, the shape constraint may be disjoint.

briefdescription.para: constructConstraint Construct a costraint which matches the border of the convexhull

parameterdescription.para: with the points of the volume. Points of the volume, must follow the border of the volume. Last point is connected to first point. The minimum number of points is 3.

memberdef.argsstring: (const geo::ShapeConstPtr &shape, const geo::Pose3D &entity_pose, const double offset=0.0)
memberdef.name: constructShapeConstraint

briefdescription.para: constructShapeConstraint Construct a constraint based on the mesh of shape

parameterdescription.para: shape of the volume in entity frame
